column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////All the food we did try was really good. The crab and avacado
column2: the fried chicken and the shortrib stroganoff were great. The mashed potatoes...not so much. They are described as "buttery" with garlic and chicken jus. But what I got was a big bowl of potatoes that were swimming in butter. Like 1/3 of the dish was butter. This was just too much.
